snippet: They will remain in New York for at least another six months after the inauguration, transition officials said, out of concern for uprooting him in the middle of the school year....
abstract: Officials from Trump transition team say president-elect's wife Melania and son Barron will not move immediately in January to White House but will remain at Trump Tower in midtown Manhattan to avoid disruption in Barron's school year; announcement means logistical challenge of keeping Fifth Avenue residence secure will continue indefinitely.
lead_paragraph: They will remain in New York for at least another six months after the inauguration, transition officials said, out of concern for uprooting him in the middle of the school year.

headline.main: Melania and Barron Trump Won’t Immediately Move to White House
headline.print_headline: Melania and Barron Trump Won’t Immediately Move to White House, Officials Say
